Package application

Class BaseStoreApiAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.BaseStoreApiAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStoreApiAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StoreApiAdapterWalmart

    public abstract class BaseStoreApiAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStoreApiAdapter
    BaseStoreApiAdapter - abstract class which is an adapter for any store which has these fields in common to be used
    Author:
    Andrew P. Albanese
